languages.text: "Единственное оправдание твоего существования — помощь тем, кого ты предала. Не забывай об этом".
"Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."
languages.original_text: "Единственное оправдание твоего существования — помощь тем, кого ты предала. Не забывай об этом".

traits.locale_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你之所以还能继续活着，仅仅是因为对那些被你背叛的人而言，你依然能派得上用场。千万不要忘记这一点。”
languages.original_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."

traits.locale_text: “你之所以还能继续活着，仅仅是因为对那些被你背叛的人而言，你依然能派得上用场。千万不要忘记这一点。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Votre survie dépend désormais entièrement de votre utilité. Tâchez de ne pas l'oublier. »
languages.original_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."

traits.locale_text: « Votre survie dépend désormais entièrement de votre utilité. Tâchez de ne pas l'oublier. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La continuidad de tu existencia depende de que resultes útil a la gente a la que has traicionado. No lo olvides».
languages.original_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."

traits.locale_text: «La continuidad de tu existencia depende de que resultes útil a la gente a la que has traicionado. No lo olvides».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたがまだ生きているのは、その手で裏切った人々の役に立つからというだけだ。それを忘れるな」
languages.original_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたがまだ生きているのは、その手で裏切った人々の役に立つからというだけだ。それを忘れるな」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Euer Leben hängt ausschließlich davon ab, dass Ihr den Leuten, die Ihr verraten habt, nützlich seid. Vergesst das niemals."
languages.original_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Leben hängt ausschließlich davon ab, dass Ihr den Leuten, die Ihr verraten habt, nützlich seid. Vergesst das niemals."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."

languages.text: "Sırtından bıçakladığın insanların işine yaradığın için hâlâ nefes alıyorsun. Bunu sakın unutma."
languages.original_text: "Your continued existence is entirely dependent on your being useful to the people you betrayed. Never forget that."

traits.locale_text: "Aldığın her nefes, sırtından bıçakladığın insanların bir işine yaramana bağlı. Bunu sakın unutma."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
